Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Head is located above all other parts of the body but is not worshipped. Nor are eyes worshipped which see far in the distance.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: iesy kr ky hI isr nhIˆ pUijAw jwˆdw, kÎoˆik srIr AMdr ieh au`cw AKOˆdw hY qy iesy kr ky hI idRsit idRstwˆq kY ingHw Br ky q`kn vwly hox kwrx locn nyqR BI nhIˆ pUjy jwˆdy[

lines.gurmukhi: pUjIAY n sRvn duriq snbMD kir; pUjIAY n nwskw subws sÍws kRwNq kY [

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Ears are not worshipped for their power of hearing nor nostrils for their ability to smell and breathe.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: kMn BI jo suriq sunx jog vsqUAwˆ nwl myl krdy hn, nhIˆ pUjy jw skdy eysy kr ky hI Aqy nwswˆ n`k BI jo sÍws dÍwry sugMDI nUM 'kRwˆq kY' AwkriKAw iKicAw krdw hY, nhIˆ pUijAw jwˆdw iesy kr ky, Bwv au`cy qy A`gy vDy hox kr ky[

lines.gurmukhi: pUjIAY n muK sÍwd sbd sMjugq kY; pUjIAY n hsq skl AMg pwNq kY [

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Mouth which enjoys all the tastes and make speech, is not worshipped nor the hands which nourish all other limbs.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: mUMh BI jo sÍwd Aqy Sbd bcn iblws nwl sMjugiq kY sbMD pOˆdw rihMdw hY, nhIˆ pUijAw jwˆdw Aqy h`Q BI jo swirAwˆ AMgwˆ smUh SrIr aupr pwˆq ltkdy iPrdy hn, Bwv srIr Br nUM mwpn vwly hn, nhIˆ pUjy jwˆdy eysy kr ky hI[

Shamsher Singh Puri.translation: Feet which are devoid of ability to see, talk, hear, smell or taste are worshipped for their traits of humility. (289)
